title: Message Says It All
author: JGray
text:
Hidden Name: Spacey

Cameo: John Bryant

I have nothing much to say here except...

Be here Thursday. It is the moment many of you have been waiting for.

That is all.

See you Thursday!

replies.author: Aleena*Guest*
replies.text: So that's what that weird image is. Graffiti of you.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text:
A moment we've been waiting for?
Hmm, I'm guessing it's either Aleena's cameo or "more lesbian elf kisses".

Looking forward to finding out on, well, probably monday.
Traveling. Intermittent internet.
